statements: DELETE FROM bookings WHERE booking_date = '2023-12-31' AND status = 'Confirmed';
DELETE FROM bookings WHERE user_id = 123 AND booking_reference = 'REF456';
DELETE FROM bookings WHERE booking_type = 'refund' AND booking_date < '2022-01-01';

DELETE FROM flights WHERE departure_date < '2022-10-01' AND destination = 'New York';
DELETE FROM flights WHERE flight_id = 123 AND airline = 'Delta Air Lines';
DELETE FROM hotels WHERE location = 'Paris' AND room_type = 'Suite';
DELETE FROM Hotels WHERE rating < 3 AND price > 2000.00;
